Welcome to Stitch & Savour

Homemade food and handcrafted crochet products made with love

About Sangita Thakur

At Stitch & Savour, every product tells a story of warmth, care, and creativity. Founded by Sangita Thakur, our venture is built on love for homemade food and the joy of handmade crochet art.
